overview: “Randy is Senior Vice President of Creative Direction for Expo TV and is responsible for Expo TV’s overall look and feel including all design elements and graphical production. Prior to Expo, he was a founding partner of Myopic Films, an award winning New York City production house, specializing in broadcast graphics and animation for clients such as NBC, ABC, Nickelodeon, Carsey Werner, VH1, and Oxygen Media. Additionally, Randy was a founding employee of Oxygen Media where he served as Head of the Animation and Design Team. Randy has over nine years of television experience and his work has been recognized by PROMAX, BDA, and the New York Underground Film Festival. He holds a Master’s Degree from New York University’s Kanbar Institute of Film & Television.” (Source: ExpoTV)
